casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
John Edward BUTLER No. 629P01-7 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 John Edward Butler, Raleigh, for Butler, John Edward. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 27th of December 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Robeson County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of December 2018 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of December 2018 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
